definitions.definition: A blue giant star in the constellation Cygnus ; Alpha (α) Cygni. It forms one corner of the Summer Triangle . Deneb is one of the brightest stars in the night sky, and one of the most luminous stars known.

main_definition: ( astronomy ) A blue giant star in the constellation Cygnus ; Alpha (α) Cygni. It forms one corner of the Summer Triangle . Deneb is one of the brightest stars in the night sky, and one of the most luminous stars known.
